mapper.insert: insert into tbl_blog_tag(blog_no, product_no, product_name) values(#{blog_no}, #{product_no}, #{product_name})
mapper.select: select blog_no, product_no, product_name, (select UUID from tbl_img where product_no = #{product_no} ) as uuid, (select IMG_NAME from tbl_img where product_no = #{product_no} ) as file_name, (select IMG_PATH from tbl_img where product_no = #{product_no} ) as file_path from tbl_blog_tag where blog_no = #{blog_no}

select * from tbl_product
product_name like '%' || #{product_name} || '%'
product_no like #{product_no} || '%'
order by product_no asc

select p.product_no, p.product_name, i.UUID as uuid, i.IMG_NAME as file_name, i.IMG_PATH as file_path from tbl_product p left join tbl_img i on p.product_no = i.product_no where p.user_id = #{user_id}
